sys_documentation.label: Does the Representative Example contain the required information?

sys_documentation.hint:
"Must be labelled “Representative Example”.
All of the required information must be given equal prominence, be in the required format, and be set out correctly.
Select N/A for interest free or if a Representative Example is not triggered."
